channel.title: Would a quad core fry the shit out of this motherboard?
channel.description:
I'm thinking of buying a quad core processor which is a deadly raging beast, but i'm not quite sure if it will fry my motherboard because of it's severe masculine anal rapage. (I'm just kidding it's not really that great.. But it's better than my shit.)
CPU I want: http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16819103471
Motherboard I have: [img]http://i536.photobucket.com/albums/ff321/zipl0ck/motherboard.png[/img]
Piece of shit right? Yeh I know, but I don't know if it's to shitty to handle the quad core. :\
Well.. Do you think it can handle it? I only ask this because my friend had this 3Ghz quad core and it fried his mainboard.

item.title: Would a quad core fry the shit out of this motherboard?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:5, topic:299548”]Ignore my advice, that mobo will not be compatiable. It is AM3
Which processor do you have at the moment?

This mobo will be compatible:

newegg.com

GIGABYTE GA-MA770-UD3 AM2+/AM2 AMD 770 ATX AMD Motherboard - Newegg.com

Buy GIGABYTE GA-MA770-UD3 AM2+/AM2 AMD 770 ATX AMD Motherboard with fast shipping and top-rated customer service.Once you know, you Newegg!

If you are going to get a CPU as sexy as that you must invest in new RAM or the extra performance will not be noticeable. The mobo above unfortunately only supports DDR2, but really fast DDR2 so there are no worries. It seems that only motherboards with AM3 sockets can take DDR3.

I am an intel fanboy so I am not an expert on some things.[/quote]

I figured out that my mobo would fry like a bitch, so im going to invest more money and get a new mobo, and thanks I might use that mobo you suggested.

Read full topic
item.source: Would a quad core fry the shit out of this motherboard?

item.title: Would a quad core fry the shit out of this motherboard?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Ignore my advice, that mobo will not be compatiable. It is AM3
Which processor do you have at the moment?

This mobo will be compatible:

newegg.com

GIGABYTE GA-MA770-UD3 AM2+/AM2 AMD 770 ATX AMD Motherboard - Newegg.com

Buy GIGABYTE GA-MA770-UD3 AM2+/AM2 AMD 770 ATX AMD Motherboard with fast shipping and top-rated customer service.Once you know, you Newegg!

If you are going to get a CPU as sexy as that you must invest in new RAM or the extra performance will not be noticeable. The mobo above unfortunately only supports DDR2, but really fast DDR2 so there are no worries. It seems that only motherboards with AM3 sockets can take DDR3.

I am an intel fanboy so I am not an expert on some things.

Read full topic
item.source: Would a quad core fry the shit out of this motherboard?

item.title: Would a quad core fry the shit out of this motherboard?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Budda:

Haven’t clicked link or checked your mobo, but I’m going to hazard a guess and say that it wont fit in your motherboard. Theres this thing called a socket type, if they dont match, they dont fit.

It has the correct socket type, I already checked.

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:3, topic:299548”]That picture tells us nothing, get an actual link to your mobo.
First of all if you currently have an Intel cpu you will defiantly need a need mobo.

This would be a suitable mobo however you would need DDR3 RAM, which you probably dont.

newegg.com

Computer Parts, PC Components, Laptop Computers, LED LCD TV, Digital Cameras and...

Newegg.com offers the best prices on computer products, laptop computers, LED LCD TVs, digital cameras, electronics, unlocked phones, office supplies, and more with fast shipping and top-rated customer service. Newegg shopping upgraded ™

I will try to get better specifications. I have DDR PC3200. :\

PS. That is one sexy motherboard.

Read full topic
item.source: Would a quad core fry the shit out of this motherboard?
